dc:title: Valiant is the Word
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A story of a Black Catholic convert, Iola Ellis. Though discriminated against in both north and south, she enabled her nieces to receive a higher education. The story emphasizes the need for Black Catholic leaders.
